content: Prodapt is a leading provider of consulting, technology services and digital transformation solutions to the Telecommunications industry. Headquartered in Chennai, India, the company has a global presence with offices and delivery centers in the Americas, Europe, Middle East, Africa, and Asia-Pacific. Prodapt's services span across Consulting, Networks, Digital Customer Experience, Managed Services, and Business Operations. The company has expertise in emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Robotic Process Automation, Internet of Things, and Cloud. Prodapt has been recognized by industry analysts and publications such as Gartner, Forrester, and Deloitte as a leading provider of digital transformation solutions to the Telecommunications industry.
